images.copyright: The Old City of Bern, Switzerland (© Xantana/Getty Images)
images.title: Lights of the Old City
images.caption: The Old City of Bern
images.desc: Welcome to a wintry wonderland in Bern, the capital of Switzerland. We're in Bern's medieval center—the Old City—which looks much as it did when many of these buildings were constructed between the 12th and 15th centuries.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
